item.title: PostgreSQL查看复制状态
item.description: 查看复制状态 在master上执行 sky=# select * from pg_stat_replication; -[ RECORD 1 ]----+------------------------------ pid | 13321 usesysid | 17019 usename | replication application_name | walreceiver client_addr | 10.0.0.81 client_hostname | client_port | 42809 backend_start | 2016-08-11 10:57:35.856289+08 backend_xmin | state | streaming sent_location | 1/E0CE9750 write_location | 1/E0CE9750 flush_location | 1/E0CE9750 replay_location | 1/E0CE9750 sync_priority | 0 sync_state
